name: HopeConfessions
0:
”Alexa, open hope confessions”
”Alexa, start hope confessions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hope confessions
des:
Hope confessions to speak and meditate on to be uplifted. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
